description.displayText: There are not enough words to express what Ngolela has meant to our family. She is truly an exceptional person - an absolute treasure. Always the ultimate professional,  Ngolela's experience with children is clearly evident. She is caring, joyful, insightful, attentive, creative, independent, and respectful. She is everything you could hope to find in a caregiver and more. From the moment I heard her singing to our infant girl, to the time I found myself in tears flipping through the scrapbook she made for our daughter's first birthday, I could not believe how lucky we were to have Ngolela in our lives. She has loved our baby girl as we do, and I don't think you can ask for anything more.

description.displayText: Ngolela joined our family a few months before the birth of our 4th child and was the missing link that kept us functioning through all of the craziness. She always has a cheerful disposition, and we love the energy and enthusiasm she brings into our home each morning. She has a special ability to engage with kids of all ages, and my children adore her. Ngolela loves planning adventures and excursions for the kids, and I rely on her knowledge of events and activities around the city. She is happy to juggle as many balls (and children) as we throw at her! She designs clothing in her free time, and she has sewn pajamas and mended stuffed animals for the kids. But most importantly, she is kind, reliable, fun, punctual, organized and exactly the type of person you would want to be with your children in your absence. I highly recommend Ngolela!

description.displayText: Ngolela worked with us for over 2 years until as our nanny. She took care of our 3 kids ages 3-9. We think the world of her. She is very easy to work with and needs very little direction which is super helpful for working parents who are juggling enough. She will always respond to you promptly, be on time, be happy and willing and able. She has taught our kids sewing/clothes making which is a passion of hers. She is an excellent driver and can handle multiple kids with ease. Your kids will have fun with Ngolela and be well taken care of.
